name: Drivin' Alive
description:
Keep your friend's plant alive by driving ambulance.

Your friend went away for a week and left you his plant to look after. However, it must be watered with a special mixture, which is expensive. Fortunately, you have recently been working casual as an ambulance driver.

If you receive the right amount of jobs and complete them correctly, you should succeed.

Good luck.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 46. Theme "Keep it alive"
